snippet: Blatter, FIFA’s former president, attended a seven-hour hearing in Switzerland to challenge a ban for approving a payment to a former adviser in 2011.
abstract: Sepp Blatter returns to FIFA headquarters in Zurich to appeal eight-year ban imposed by organization for his approval of $2 million payment to former adviser Michel Platini in 2011.
lead_paragraph: Blatter, FIFA’s former president, attended a seven-hour hearing in Switzerland to challenge a ban for approving a payment to a former adviser in 2011.

headline.main: Sepp Blatter Goes Before FIFA to Appeal 8-Year Suspension
headline.print_headline: Blatter Goes Before FIFA to Appeal 8-Year Ban
